results.text: Mi iwala iîij ineqqeô ed, inna: "wagi d Mass iw, wagi meqqweô kteô". Mi i$li, inna: "a yagdud iw! Nek rri$ akkin ayen tepcarakem.
Nek zzi$ udem iw ar Win Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan, male$ ar tidep. Ur lli$, nek, seg imcurak".
Ixuûem it ugdud is, inna: "day ad iyi txaûmem $ef Öebbi? Ni$ Inha yi; ur ugade$ ayen i S tcurkem, siwa ma illa wayen i S ihwan i Mass iw. Tussna n Mass iw tezdi yal cci, day ur d tesmektayem ara?
Amek ara ugade$ ayen tepcarakem, ur tugadem mi kunwi tepcarakem, i Öebbi, ayen iwumi ur d Issers adabu fellawen? Anwa, ger sin ikabaran, i iklalen laman, maday tessnem"?
Wid iumnen, ur sselsen ddens i liman nnsen, widak ad ilin di laman, u nitni pwanhan.
D wagi ay d awal nne£. Nefka yas t i Ibôahim, mgal agdud is. Nessalay tiseddaôin, win i£ £ ihwan. Ih, Mass ik d Bab n ûûwab, d Amusnaw.
Nefka yas Isêaq akked Yaâqub. I sin, Nenha ten. Nenha, zik, Nuê akw, ger tarwa s, Dawed, Sliman, Yub, Yusef, Musa, Haôun, - Akka ay Nepkafi iâaôviyen -
